statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT change_description FROM regulatory_changes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, change_description FROM regulatory_changes WHERE id > 5;
SELECT DATE_PART('year', date) AS year, COUNT(*) AS change_count FROM regulatory_changes GROUP BY year ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, change_description FROM regulatory_changes WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes WHERE change_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT id, date, change_description FROM regulatory_changes WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, change_description FROM regulatory_changes WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes;
SELECT change_description FROM regulatory_changes;
SELECT change_id, change_description FROM regulatory_changes WHERE change_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA';
SELECT agency_name FROM regulatory_agencies ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes WHERE change_id = 1;
SELECT agency_name FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA' ORDER BY agency_id DESC;
SELECT change_description, change_date FROM regulatory_changes WHERE change_date >= '2021-01-01' AND change_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes JOIN regulatory_agencies ON regulatory_changes.change_id = regulatory_agencies.agency_id;
SELECT agency_name, jurisdiction, change_description FROM regulatory_agencies JOIN regulatory_changes ON regulatory_agencies.agency_id = regulatory_changes.change_id ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes;
SELECT company_name, industry_type FROM companies WHERE company_type = 'Public';
SELECT change_description, change_date FROM regulatory_changes WHERE change_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM companies ORDER BY industry_type DESC;
SELECT agency_name, jurisdiction FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC, change_id ASC;
SELECT change_description, change_date FROM regulatory_changes WHERE change_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, industry_type FROM companies WHERE company_type = 'Public' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT agency_name, jurisdiction FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE jurisdiction = 'Finance' ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes WHERE change_description LIKE '%regulation%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes;
SELECT id, change_date, change_description FROM regulatory_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM regulatory_entities WHERE entity_type='Government';
SELECT company_name, location FROM fintech_companies WHERE industry_focus='Blockchain' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_relations ORDER BY company_id, entity_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes;
SELECT id, change_date FROM regulatory_changes WHERE change_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM regulatory_entities ORDER BY entity_type DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry_focus FROM fintech_companies WHERE location = 'USA' AND industry_focus = 'Fintech';

SELECT rr.relation_id, re.entity_name, fc.company_name FROM regulatory_relations rr JOIN regulatory_entities re ON rr.entity_id = re.entity_id JOIN fintech_companies fc ON rr.company_id = fc.company_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes;
SELECT change_description, change_date FROM regulatory_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, regulation_status FROM fintech_companies WHERE country='USA';
SELECT company_id, company_name, country, regulation_status FROM fintech_companies WHERE regulation_status='Compliant';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_watchlist WHERE watchlist_reason LIKE '%non-compliance%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC, change_id ASC;
SELECT agency_name, jurisdiction FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_id IN (SELECT agency_id FROM regulatory_actions);
SELECT company_name, country, regulation_status FROM fintech_companies WHERE regulation_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT r.change_description, r.change_date, a.action_description, a.action_date FROM regulatory_changes r JOIN regulatory_actions a ON r.change_id = a.action_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_watchlist WHERE watchlist_reason LIKE '%security%';
